feed.title: Tresobis: A Writing Collective
feed.subtitle: The Repressed Enigmatic Sphygmus Of Bounteous Intellect Speaks

entry.title: Fortitude
entry.content: “To a degree, you can make up for a lack of physical robustness with mental endourance; but you can’t make up for a lack of mental fortitude with any amount of physical prowess.”
entry.summary: “To a degree, you can make up for a lack of physical robustness with mental endourance; but you can’t make up for a lack of mental fortit

entry.title: Organizations
entry.content: “Any organization of people of sufficient size will become disorganized.”
entry.summary: “Any organization of people of sufficient size will become disorganized.”

entry.title: Imagination
entry.content: “We can try to imagine all the things we can imagine, but we can’t imagine the things we can’t imagine.”
entry.summary: “We can try to imagine all the things we can imagine, but we can’t imagine the things we can’t imagine.”
